quality_assessment: Excellent documentation with comprehensive coverage of advanced features. All documented features are accurately implemented in the codebase.

issues.section: Data Flow Analysis > Variable Dependency Tracking
issues.description: Documentation mentions 'Mutable vs immutable references' tracking, but this is not explicitly implemented in DataFlowGraph
issues.current_content: variable_dependencies: HashMap<String, HashSet<String>> - tracks variable names only
issues.should_be: Track distinction between mutable and immutable variable usage
issues.fix_suggestion: Either remove the claim about tracking mutable vs immutable references, or document this as a future enhancement

issues.section: Data Flow Analysis > Modification Impact Analysis
issues.description: Documentation shows detailed JSON output with 'io_operations' field, but ModificationImpact struct doesn't include this field
issues.current_content: ModificationImpact has: affected_functions, dependency_count, has_side_effects, risk_level
issues.should_be: Add io_operations field to ModificationImpact or update documentation example
issues.fix_suggestion: Update example JSON to match actual ModificationImpact struct fields or enhance struct to include io_operations details

issues.description: Documentation shows 'is_pure' and 'purity_confidence' as Option types, which is correct, but doesn't mention the newer 'purity_level' field that provides three-level classification
issues.fix_suggestion: Add brief mention that purity detection now includes a three-level classification (Pure/ProbablyPure/Impure) via purity_level field for more nuanced analysis

issues.description: Cache statistics structure documented as having 'memory_bytes' field, but actual implementation uses 'memory_usage'
issues.current_content: CacheStats { hits, misses, evictions, hit_rate, miss_rate, memory_usage }
issues.should_be: Update documentation example to use 'memory_usage' instead of 'memory_bytes'
issues.fix_suggestion: Change 'memory_bytes' to 'memory_usage' in the example JSON output
